fullText:
Mark of Finding [Dragonmark]

Heroic Tier
Benefit: When an enemy granting combat advantage to you is adjacent to you and shifts, you can shift 1 square into a square it vacates as a free action.
You can master and perform the Detect Object, Detect Secret Doors, Find the Path, and Inquisitiveâ€™s Eyes rituals as if you had the Ritual Caster feat.

Published in Eberron Player's Guide, page(s) 90.
name: Mark of Finding
